description: World seas represents the boundaries for the major oceans and seas of the world. The source for the boundaries is the publication 'Limits of Oceans & Seas, Special Publication No. 23' published by the IHO in 1953. (http://www.marineregions.org/files/S23_1953.pdf)
keywords: World, World Oceans, Boundaries, Oceans, Seas, Downloadable Data
name: IHO Sea Areas
